extendedInfo.description: Download the app for free and join the fight for our planet's survival!2nd Mass Defense game from TNT. Mechs and skitters from the TNT original series FALLING SKIES are attacking from all sides. Tilt and turn your device to scan your surroundings, locating the aliens so you can use your machine gun or grenades to wipe them off the face of the Earth. Image Recognition Feature: Scan posters, cups and even  a rollercoaster all over the U.S. and launch the 3D Falling Skies Experience. The game uses your device's camera to bring the battle to you, placing 3D-animated aliens into your surrounding environment. Face off with the alien menace over your morning coffee or on your way to school. Your world becomes part of the game. The battle for humanity's survival begins right here. Download the app for free today!

reviews.title: Motorola Droid Maxx
reviews.comment: Initial start screen loads, when you go into training, or to open the game itself, it crashes immediately!
reviews.author: Shaun Sullivan

reviews.title: This game sucks
reviews.comment: In all my years of playing games this is the warst my bick can make a better game then this.
reviews.author: Luz Otero

reviews.title: Atrocity
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe how bad this game is. The aim is awful, it force closes or freezes your phone. This is an insult to such a great show! It could have been awesome, the idea is there at least.
reviews.author: Jason Wallingford

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Playing on a Galaxy S4, once past the menu\'s all I get is horrible lag and flickering green backgrounds, I realize this app initially released awhile back now but it would be nice to see some compatibility updates or even just a bit of general attention, for newer fans of the show such as myself it is quite a disappointment to come across this as an official network tie in for the show. Get it together or just take it off the Play Store.
reviews.author: Brett Brindamour

reviews.title: Motorola photon, poor performance
reviews.comment: Great idea, terrible execution, constantly crashes, minimap is glitchy, turning to aim is sometimes backwards, alien sprites flash in place so i cant tell what theyre doing. Terrible.
reviews.author: ovid aboutblank

reviews.title: Can\'t even play
reviews.comment: Downloaded and won\'t even go to game..just down as soon as you hit new game
reviews.author: Chris Avery

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Force closes way to much and very glichy hope it gets better good idea though.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Hudek

reviews.title: Looked like fun
reviews.comment: Good game on the droid RAZR but doesn\'t work at all on galaxy s4
reviews.author: Jeff Drake

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: Can\'t move your weapon or do anything.
reviews.author: Brian Suhr

reviews.title: Game too unstable
reviews.comment: Like the concept but the game is to buggy and freezes
reviews.author: Doug Stuckey

reviews.title: Just bad.
reviews.comment: Love the show though.
reviews.author: Randall Lowe

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Doesnt play on my galaxy s 4.
reviews.author: Demon Dog

reviews.title: What the ....?
reviews.comment: I don\'t get it. Game is weird and doesn\'t make sense. Poor gameplay. Only graphics on half of the screen. Not sure what I am supposed to do. So sad. Samsung Galaxy 3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Hit skip to game and it just didn\'t work. Had to delete like 30 games to get this. Dumb move.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So much for AVR...
reviews.comment: Game world wouldn\'t respond to real world movement/rotation reliably. Advertising posing as a game. Save your bits for something better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DROID x
reviews.comment: Same deal. Scanner works but \"skip to game\" crashes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Skitters!!
reviews.comment: Awesome game you feel like your there looking for skitters in your world
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Blows! Don\'t download it till they Get it fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I hope Season 2 is better than the app
reviews.comment: All in all, I think the game is okay.  Not great, but okay.  If anyone is griping about how to operate the controls, you are lame.  It is easy to figure out.  Otherwise the only major complaint I have is the gun sound file got into a loop after I finished shooting the \'gun\'.
reviews.author: A Google User
